creator: lkarpel@eloquent.com
text:
I want to use a JVM other than the client JVM installed in the current plug-
in's JRE. I have the 1.4.2 shipping JDK installed at C:\j2sdk1.4.2 ..

If I use the 'Configure Tomcat' start menu item and attempt to set the 'Java 
VM' field to either:

   C:\j2sdk1.4.2\bin\java.exe

or

   C:\j2sdk1.4.2\jre\bin\server\jvm.dll

The service will not start .. no errors are written to any log as far as I can 
tell.

The service ONLY starts if the 'Java VM' field is set to 'java'.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The two seem duplicates, and concern commons-daemon (no Tomcat code involved).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 22174 ***
